hero.title: Apply for Support
hero.subtitle: Submit your application for financial and technical assistance from Roberto Save Dreams Foundation.

intro.title: Application Process
intro.description: Thank you for your interest in applying for support from Roberto Save Dreams Foundation. Please review the information below carefully before starting your application. Fields marked with an asterisk (*) are required.
steps: Complete and submit the online application form
Our team reviews your application (2-4 weeks)
Selected applicants are invited for an interview or site visit

programTypes.title: Microloan
programTypes.description: Small business loans ranging from $500 to $5,000 for entrepreneurs looking to start or expand their businesses.
eligibility: Must have a viable business plan
Must complete our business training workshop
Must be a resident of a community where we operate
Must demonstrate inability to access traditional banking services

programTypes.title: Education Grant
programTypes.description: Financial support for students at various levels of education, from primary school to university.
eligibility: Must be enrolled or accepted in an accredited educational institution
Must be committed to community service
Must be a resident of a country where we operate

programTypes.title: Community Development Project
programTypes.description: Funding and technical support for community-led initiatives in areas such as clean water, renewable energy, and sustainable agriculture.
eligibility: Must be a registered community organization or have community endorsement
Project must address a clear community need
Must demonstrate community participation and ownership
Must have a sustainable plan for long-term maintenance
Must be in a geographic area where we operate

documentUpload.title: Supporting Documents
documentUpload.description: Please upload the following documents to support your application. Accepted formats: PDF, JPG, PNG. Maximum file size: 5MB per document.

declaration.title: Declaration
declaration.text: I hereby declare that the information provided in this application is true and accurate to the best of my knowledge. I understand that any false statements or misrepresentations may result in the rejection of my application or termination of any support received. I authorize Roberto Save Dreams Foundation to verify any information provided in this application.

consentItems.text: I consent to the collection and processing of my personal information for the purpose of evaluating my application.
I have read and agree to the terms and conditions of the Roberto Save Dreams Foundation support programs.
I consent to being contacted by Roberto Save Dreams Foundation regarding my application and other relevant opportunities.

success.title: Application Submitted Successfully!
success.message: Thank you for submitting your application to Roberto Save Dreams Foundation. We have received your application and will review it carefully. You will receive an email confirmation shortly, and we will contact you within 2-4 weeks regarding the status of your application.

error.title: Submission Error
error.message: We encountered an error while submitting your application. Please check your internet connection and try again. If the problem persists, please contact us at applications@robertosavedreams.org for assistance.
